languages.text: Если Вольный Торговец не желает ждать вместе с обычными просителями, {mf|он|она} вол{mf|ен|ьна} вернуться после Магнэ Ацессио и заверить грамоту без очереди.

traits.locale_text: Если Вольный Торговец не желает ждать вместе с обычными просителями, {mf|он|она} вольна вернуться после Магнаэ Ацессио и заверить грамоту без очереди.

languages.text: If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.
languages.original_text: Если Вольный Торговец не желает ждать вместе с обычными просителями, {mf|он|она} вол{mf|ен|ьна} вернуться после Магнэ Ацессио и заверить грамоту без очереди.

traits.locale_text: If the Rogue Trader doesn't want to wait in queue with other applicants, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.
If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.
If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.

languages.text: Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne souhaite pas faire la queue avec les autres requérants, {mf|il|elle} peut revenir après la Magnae Accessio pour faire certifier le document sans attendre.
languages.original_text: If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.

traits.locale_text: Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne souhaite pas faire la queue avec les autres requérants, {mf|il|elle} peut revenir après la Magnae Accessio pour faire certifier le document sans attendre.

languages.text: 如果行商浪人不打算和其他请愿者一起排队等待，{mf|他|她}可以在继任颂典结束之后再次返回，直接跳过等待的人群进行认证。
languages.original_text: If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.

traits.locale_text: 如果行商浪人不打算和其他请愿者一起排队等待，{mf|他|她}可以在继任颂典结束之后再次返回，直接跳过等待的人群进行认证。

languages.text: 自由開拓者が他の嘆願者と同じ列に並んで待機することを望まない場合、マグナ・アクセシオの式典の後に戻ってくることで、長時間待つことなく書類を認証してもらうことができる。
languages.original_text: If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が他の嘆願者と同じ列に並んで待機することを望まない場合、マグナ・アクセシオの式典の後に戻ってくることで、長時間待つことなく書類を認証してもらうことができる。

languages.text: Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht mit den anderen Antragstellern in der Schlange warten muss, kann {mf|er|sie} auch nach der Magnae-Accessio-Zeremonie zurückkehren und das Dokument ohne lange Wartezeit beglaubigen lassen.
languages.original_text: If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.

traits.locale_text: Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht mit den anderen Antragstellern in der Schlange warten muss, kann {mf|er|sie} auch nach der Magnae-Accessio-Zeremonie zurückkehren und das Dokument ohne lange Wartezeit beglaubigen lassen.

languages.text: Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no quiere esperar en la cola con los otros solicitantes, puede volver después de la Magnae Accessio y certificar el documento sin la larga espera.
languages.original_text: If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.

traits.locale_text: Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no quiere esperar en la cola con los otros solicitantes, puede volver después de la Magnae Accessio y certificar el documento sin la larga espera.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, diğer müracaatçılarla birlikte sırada beklemek istemiyorsa Magnae Accessio töreninden sonra geri dönüp belgeyi uzun süre beklemeden tasdik ettirebilir.
languages.original_text: If the Rogue Trader does not want to wait in queue with the other petitioners, {mf|he|she} can return after the Magnae Accessio ceremony and certify the document without the long wait.
